title: New York Firm Recalls Chorizo Products Due to Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 16, 2015 Buffalo Provisions, a Bronx, N.Y. establishment, is recalling approximately 48,210 pounds of chorizo product due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products may contain peanuts, a known...
